title: Silver player LF friends?
body:
I'm keen to join a team or just hang out in skype (or what ever). Most my old friends left the game so hit me up!
I haven't played ranked in a while, but hoping to start again soon after brushing up on some skills and learning more champs. I got to Silver 1 in season 5 then took a break. My preferred roles are jungle & top as I used to main Vi and Diana though currently focusing a lot on Fiora. My weakest role is adc. These are some more of the champs I enjoy playing, and with a higher level of proficiency than others: 
Fiora
Vi
Elise
Diana
Sejuani
Malzahar
Xin Zao
Ahri
Renekton
Volibear
Amumu
Leona

Add me: jonnyeps
